name: Noble Metals
description:
In Noble Metals, you play as an alchemist—well, nearly. Your actual job title is "computer," someone who performs calculations for the benefit of others' research. But now, in the midst of your math, you've done what no one else has, discovered the secret of turning iron to gold. What will you do about it?

CW: This story contains depiction of self-inflicted injury and implied misogyny.

The itch.io cover image is adapted from JAK MALY JEST ATOM.jpg, licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 4.0 International license. The cover is therefore likewise available for use under this license.
